#pdf预览测试 ```

//$(‘#preview_agreement_dialog’).modal(‘show’); //预览合同 // $.ajax({ // type: “GET”, // url: “http://localhost:9898/api/uploadagreement?path=”+row.AgreementPath, // }).done(function (data) { // var file = new Blob([(data)], {type: ‘application/pdf’}); // var fileURL = window.URL.createObjectURL(file); // //$scope.content = $sce.trustAsResourceUrl(fileURL); // //$(‘#readPdf’).attr(‘href’,fileURL); // //$(‘#readPdf’).media({width:500, height:400}); // window.open(fileURL); // //$(‘#preview_agreement_dialog’).modal(‘show’); // }); var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest(); xhr.open(‘GET’, “http://localhost:9898/api/uploadagreement?path=” + row.AgreementPath, true); xhr.responseType = ‘arraybuffer’; xhr.onload = function (e) { if (this.status == 200) { // var blob=new Blob([this.response], {type:”application/pdf”}); // var fileURL = window.URL.createObjectURL(blob); //$(‘#preview_agreement_dialog’).modal(‘show’); // var pdf = fileURL;

    var blob = new Blob([this.response], {type: "application/pdf;base64"});
    var fileURL = window.URL.createObjectURL(blob);
    // var viewerUrl = 'http://localhost:9797/assets/scripts/pdf/web/viewer.html?file=' + encodeURIComponent(fileURL);
    // console.log(viewerUrl);
    // var win = window.open('','UATRpt', 'menubar=0,location=0,toolbar=0,resizable=1,status=1,scrollbars=1');
    // if(win.document) {
    //     win.document.write('<html><head><title>Your Report Title</title></head><body height="100%" width="100%"><iframe src="' + viewerUrl + '" height="100%" width="100%"></iframe></body></html>');
    // }
    var url = $state.href('pdfview');
    url = url + "?file=" + encodeURIComponent(fileURL);
    window.open(url, '_blank');
} }; xhr.send(); //$('#readPdf').attr('src','http://10.0.2.22:9898/'+row.AgreementPath); ```
